member.name: T:GS1.HealthcareGMN
member.summary:
Helper class that is both a demonstration and usable implementation of a check character pair generator and verifier for a GS1 GMN that is used for Regulated Healthcare medical devices that fall under the EU regulations EU MDR 2017/745 and EU IVDR 2017/746, herein referred to as a "healthcare GMN".
Copyright (c) 2019 GS1 AISBL.

member.name: F:GS1.HealthcareGMN.weights
member.summary: Descending primes used as multipliers of each data character.

member.name: F:GS1.HealthcareGMN.cset82
member.summary: GS1 AI encodable character set 82. Place in the string represents the character value.

member.name: F:GS1.HealthcareGMN.cset32
member.summary: Subset of the encodable character set used for the check character pair.

member.name: F:GS1.HealthcareGMN.cset82val
member.summary: Character to value map for cset82.

member.name: F:GS1.HealthcareGMN.cset32val
member.summary: Character to value map for cset32.

member.name: M:GS1.HealthcareGMN.CheckCharacters(System.String)
member.summary: Character to value map for cset82.
member.exception: If the format of the given healthcare GMN is invalid.

member.name: M:GS1.HealthcareGMN.AddCheckCharacters(System.String)
member.summary: Complete a given partial healthcare GMN by appending the check character pair.
member.returns: A complete healthcare GMN including the check character pair.
member.exception: If the format of the given healthcare GMN is invalid.

member.name: M:GS1.HealthcareGMN.VerifyCheckCharacters(System.String)
member.summary: Verify that a given healthcare GMN has a correct check character pair.
member.returns: True if the healthcare GMN is has a valid check character pair. Otherwise false.
member.exception: If the format of the given healthcare GMN is invalid.

member.name: M:GS1.HealthcareGMN.GoodCharacterPositions(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicate whether each character in a given GMN belongs to the appropriate character set for the character position.
member.param: true if a GMN is being provided complete with a check character pair. Otherwise false.
member.returns: a boolean array matching each input character: true if the character belongs to the appropriate set. Otherwise false.

member.name: T:GS1.GS1Exception
member.summary: A custom exception class to differentiate exceptions raised by the utility class from other sources of error.
